title: Simulation Technology-Based Mathematical Project Leadership Course

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of Basic Mathematical Concepts and Experience Using Digital Tools
context.additional_context: For corporate elementary education administrators/leaders, aims to enhance mathematics education project design and operational competencies using simulation technology, considering smartphone-centered constrained technological environments

learning_goals: Design three or more mathematics education scenarios using a simulation technology domain consisting of four stages
Resolve over 80% of simulation tool utilization errors independently through team-based project execution
Develop and evaluate two low-specification mobile simulations for visualizing mathematical concepts

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
